      • findAugmentingPath

        private boolean findAugmentingPath(double theDeltaValue)
        Try to find the augmenting path by using Depth-First-Search algorithm.
        Parameters:
        theDeltaValue - - Delta value calculated.
        Returns:
        true if an augmenting path was found. Otherwise, false

      • findEdgeIndex

        private int findEdgeIndex(Vertex theStartVertex,
                          Vertex theEndVertex)
        Get the index of the given edge from the list of edges.
        Parameters:
        theStartVertex - the start vertex.
        theEndVertex - the end vertex.
        Returns:
        the index of the edge that connects 2 given vertices if found. Otherwise, return -1.

      • getDelta

        private int getDelta()
        Get the delta value based on all edges' capacities.
        Returns:
        an integer as the delta value.

      • dfsOnGraph

        private boolean dfsOnGraph(Vertex theStartVertex,
                           boolean[] theVisitedList,
                           double theDeltaValue)
        A recursive function that uses the Depth-First-Search algorithm with the delta value to find a path from the given vertex to the sink.
        Parameters:
        theStartVertex - a vertex that we start from.
        theVisitedList - a list of boolean values that we use to track all vertices.
        theDeltaValue - - Delta Value
        Returns:
        true if we can find a path to the sink. Otherwise, false.

      • updateGraph

        private double updateGraph()
        Update the graph based on the augmenting path. The augmenting path information is in the sink vertex.
        Returns:
        the bottle neck value.

        public void setSourceVertexName(java.lang.String mySourceVertexName)
        Sets the source vertex name
        Parameters:
        mySourceVertexName - - source vertex name passed.
